Co-founder of company providing integrated third-party sales and marketing leadership for international businesses. Represented and counseled businesses and leaders across the globe. Sold interest in 2014.* Built some of the world’s largest sales forces:* American Express: generated $500MM in sales; GE, Cigna.* Doubled sales revenue within three years for an internationally known radiant heating manufacturer.

The Dreamseat – a thematic luxurious leather recliner designed in favorite professional team colors and logo, was created for both the American consumer as well as individual sports franchises wishing to place these seats in desirable locations both on the field (as seen in the NFL and Major League Baseball) and in stadiums across America. * Font page, (top) cover story (with photograph) USA Today - December 16th, 2004.* Oversaw due diligence, competitive analyses and market research, and managing all aspects of quality control and program development. * Obtained Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM) contract and licensing from National Football League, Major League Baseball, National Basketball Association and the National Hockey League. * Raised over $3 million in working capital, signing-on the third largest recliner manufacturer in the United States, Berkline, to serve as OEM. * Created and managed all marketing and sales programs and initiatives, generating over $12 million in sales revenue in the first two years.
Senior Science Officer and Director of Business Development

Senior Science Officer and Director of Business DevelopmentManaged all environmental science related activities for a national, full-service architecture and engineering firm. Phase I, Phase II Environmental Audits, all related permitting, impact analysis, hazardous site investigation and clean-up. Recruited, trained and managed a national staff.Sear-Brown was a 1,000 people, full-service architecture, engineering, planning and construction firm with offices nationwide. They served the commercial; corporate and industrial facilities; educational and health care institutions; transportation, water and wastewater, and local and state markets

Co-founded and created the organization (501.c.3) to provide innovative business and municipal waste reduction solutions.  Raised $3 million in funding - $2 million from New York State and 1 million from the Rauch Foundation.  Procured city support in sponsoring (underwriting) the creation of Long Island New York's first material resource center.  At the center we collected what we considered to be highly re-usable products and materials for repurposing in business and for creative purposes in Long Island public schools.  Also, developed and managed a municipally supported and sponsored leaf collection system.  Said system shipped the leaves to area farms to be disced into sections laying fallow that year.  Diverted more than a million tons of organic material  that would have been otherwise shipped to nearby landfills.  All performed part-time and for no remuneration.
Three extended minors in Biology, Geology and Anthropology.
Three extended minors in Biology, Geology and Anthropology.
Long Island University, C.W. Post Campus
Earned a Masters of Science in Environmental Science.
Long Island University, C.W. Post Campus
Earned a Masters of Science in Environmental Science.
State University of New York at Stony Brook
Studied Waste Management and earned a post graduate certificate degree.

January 26, 2017, Dowayne "D" was a client of Andrew’s

Linkedin was a great resource for us to meet Andrew. We sought him out for a business speaker and mentor for our growing construction business. We invited him to be our speaker at our year end company awards dinner. Andrew was great! He was personable, approachable and interactive with our company employees and then gave the guest presentation at the banquet. His public speaking and topic approach was dynamic and interesting. It was a great time and we highly recommend Andrew for public speaking and mentor based executive training.

Brandon Williams
Owner, Designer and Creative Visionary for Modfire LLC
January 5, 2017, Brandon was a client of Andrew’s

If you are on the fence, I can tell you Andrew’s “Power Hour” was well worth the investment.  His insight was laser sharp, his suggestions and ideas were full of excellent information that not only improved my business acumen but his ideas will help expand my revenue streams. In a world of disposable personalities with cheeky catchphrases it was refreshing to meet someone so sincere and thoughtful as Andrew.  As you well know, it’s a rarity to find someone that actually delivers sound advice in a compelling way and makes you think differently. Want someone to challenge your convictions and help you open your mind to new possibilities? Looking for someone to paint the big picture for you? Need an enthusiastic vibe to revitalize you? Well this is your guru. If you are looking for a mentor that can inspire confidence and cultivate greatness within, look no further and go book your Power Hour.

December 9, 2015, Craig was a client of Andrew’s

I am a proud student of Andrew's and MentorMash.  I have learned so much from Andrew and his business partner, Terry Mullane, over the last year in regards to growing a business and setting the right course to success.  Whether you are seeking professional growth, starting a business on the right path or direction in your personal life, MentorMash is a powerful investment in your future.  The best part of MentorMash is that you are collaborating with successful business leaders.  Many business mentors or consultants I have come across, excluding MentorMash, have not actually started and created successful companies.  Andrew and his team have lived through many successes along with failure in business, therefore they speak from vast experience versus reiterating other's knowledge.  Sign up for MentorMash, you will not be disappointed.  Thank you Andrew!

Sara Kathleen Henry, Ph.D.
Founder & Editor-in-Chief
May 13, 2015, Sara Kathleen was a client of Andrew’s

Andrew worked with me as a personal leadership coach while I was in the process of starting my own mission-driven venture, and it was through our time together that I really honed in on my core values and the mission for my business. Andrew is remarkable at helping individuals understand the importance of defining your "why" and aligning your personal values with your passion and purpose in life. He was also instrumental in helping me define and embrace my strengths, and I now feel more confident in who I am and what I bring to each day that will help me shine and succeed! Every once in awhile you meet someone who adds enormous value to your life and helps you change the trajectory of your life for the better, and I found that in Andrew. I will always consider him one of my greatest mentors!

August 10, 2017, Andrew worked with Rhonda but at different companies

If you live in the 5th largest city in the U.S - Phoenix Arizona - then you likely know Rhonda Bannard.  Rhonda is such a vital part of our community here and one whose voice is respected and heard.  However, for the few that do not know Rhonda,  let's start with this...  she has a enormous heart.  Rhonda is a relentless giver... to people and this community.  A human being leaving a legacy (in action!). So why is Rhonda's voice listened to and heard?   The truth is NO, it's not just because she is highly intelligent and gifted with the skill of" promotion",  it is honestly because of who she is and how she lives her life.  It truly is an honor to know Rhonda and, if you are one of those people who don't know her and have the opportunity to meet, be sure to introduce yourself and share your passion.  I promise if you do, she not only will never forget you, someday, somehow you will recipient of her wisdom and thoughtfulness.

summary: A former environmental scientist, chief science officer, university adjunct professor, resource conservation not-for-profit founder turned author and entrepreneur (a 3 time successful business owner - one time landing him on the front page of USA Today), Andrew now is the owner of a cutting edge consulting service that makes leaders great, elevates the lives and performance of people and departments, designs and implements inspiring cultures, builds vibrant, more profitable companies and a more meaningful, happier place to work within them.
